content.query:
CREATE VIEW vProduct AS

SELECT
    ProductID,
    Name,
    ProductNumber,
    Color,
    StandardCost,
    ListPrice,
    Size,
    Weight
    ,
    ProductCategoryID,
    ProductModelID,
    SellStartDate,
    SellEndDate,
    DiscontinuedDate
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://devindatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/staging/AdventureWorks/2021/11/08/Product.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        HEADER_ROW= TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR =',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        ESCAPECHAR = '\\',
        FIELDQUOTE = '"'     
    ) as [Result]
